topic.title: CANCER CARE SPELL DELAY REASON (REFERRAL TO TREATMENT)
topic.shortdesc: CANCER CARE SPELL DELAY REASON (REFERRAL TO TREATMENT) is the reason why a Cancer Care Spell Delay occurred between the CANCER REFERRAL TO TREATMENT PERIOD START DATE and TREATMENT START DATE (CANCER), less any adjustments recorded by WAITING TIME ADJUSTMENT (FIRST SEEN) and WAITING TIME ADJUSTMENT (TREATMENT).
